Problem Statement To address the inefficiencies of the traditional Public Distribution System (PDS), this project introduces a secure and automated solution that overcomes challenges such as unreliable authentication, long wait times, and human errors. It focuses on ensuring transparency, real-time monitoring, and efficient inventory management to prevent unverified distribution, reduce wastage, and ensure that eligible beneficiaries receive their rightful entitlements.
